meanings.definition: Having a strong, earthy odor resembling that of musk.
meanings.sent1: The musky scent of the forest filled the air.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a musky smell of old books.
meanings.sent3: The musky aroma of the cheese made everyone wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the musky smell of the earth rose up around them.
meanings.sent5: The musky fragrance of the flowers lingered long after they had passed.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of musk in smell.
meanings.sent1: The musky cologne he wore reminded her of the forest.
meanings.sent2: The old cabin had a musky odor that brought back memories.
meanings.sent3: The musky perfume she wore attracted bees instead of people.
meanings.sent4: The musky aroma of the incense filled the room with a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The musky scent of the soap made her feel clean and refreshed.
